hero.title: Providing Pure Water Solutions
hero.description: We're on a mission to make clean, safe water accessible to everyone. With over 15 years of experience, we've helped thousands of families and businesses enjoy the benefits of pure, filtered water.

story.title: Our Story
paragraphs: Dr. Aqua was founded in 2009 with a simple yet powerful vision: to provide every home and business with access to clean, safe, and great-tasting water. What started as a small local operation has grown into a trusted nationwide provider of water filtration solutions.

Our founder, John Anderson, experienced firsthand the impact of poor water quality on his family's health. This personal experience drove him to create a company that would help others avoid the same struggles. Today, we're proud to have served over 10,000 customers and installed more than 25,000 water filtration systems.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.description: These principles guide everything we do and shape how we serve our customers.

items.title: Quality First
items.description: We never compromise on the quality of our products and services.

items.title: Customer Care
items.description: Your satisfaction is our top priority, always.

items.title: Excellence
items.description: We strive for excellence in everything we do.

items.title: Community
items.description: We're committed to serving and supporting our community.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.description: Key milestones that have shaped Dr. Aqua into what it is today.

milestones.event: AquaShop founded with a mission to provide clean water solutions
Expanded to 10 cities and launched professional installation services
Reached 5,000 satisfied customers and introduced commercial solutions
Launched online store and expanded nationwide
Celebrating 15 years of excellence with 10,000+ happy customers

team.title: Meet Our Leadership Team
team.description: Dedicated professionals committed to delivering the best water solutions.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Pure Water?
cta.description: Join thousands of satisfied customers who trust Dr. Aqua for their water filtration needs.
